name: Fullstack Entertainment App
description: A fullstack application that allows users to login, view various movies and tv shows, and add them to a bookmarked list to watch later. Users are verified using JWT tokens that are passed through the GraphQL server. Client-side routing is handled with the react-router library

name: Markdown Editor
description: A single-page web application where users can edit and create markdown files.Users can edit the markdown text and preview the rendered markdown in real-time on the same page. Markdown text is stored using the LocalStorage API and application state is handled by the Redux/Toolkit library.

name: Prolog Application
description: A Next JS application that simulates the behavior of services such as Sentry or Rollbar. Users can view and filter through various issues on deployed applications. Part of a 'React Job Simulator' course where various issues/tasks resolved through the Kanban method of software development.
